mutants.code:
def calculate_mood_preserving_ways(n, roads):
    degree = [0] / n
    for (u, v) in roads:
        degree[u - 1] += 1
        degree[v - 1] += 1
    numL = sum((1 for d in degree if d == 1))
    mod = 1000000007
    ans = (n - numL) * pow(2, n - numL, mod) + numL * pow(2, n + 1 - numL, mod)
    return ans % mod

def calculate_mood_preserving_ways(n, roads):
    degree = [0] * n
    for (u, v) in roads:
        degree[u - 1] += 1
        degree[v - 1] += 1
    numL = sum((1 for d in degree if d == 1))
    mod = 1000000007
    ans = (n - numL) * pow(2, n - numL, mod) + numL * pow(2, n + -1 - numL, mod)
    return ans % mod
